history.proof: intros A B f R g x y H. apply H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (R : rel B B) (g : A -> A) (x y : A), Monotonic g (⊤ ++> R @@ (f)) -> (R @@ (f)) (g x) (g y)

Premises:
rel = fun A1 A2 : Type => A1 -> A2 -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments rel (_ _)%type_scope
Unnamed_thm26 : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (R : rel B B) (x y : A), R (f x) (f y) -> (R @@ (f)) x y
rel_pull = fun (A B A' B' : Type) (f : A -> A') (g : B -> B') (R : rel A' B') (x : A) (y : B) => R (f x) (g y) : forall A B A' B' : Type, (A -> A') -> (B -> B') -> rel A' B' -> rel A B Arguments rel_pull {A B A' B'}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope
Related = fun (A B : Type) (f : A) (g : B) (R : rel A B) => R f g : forall A B : Type, A -> B -> rel A B -> Prop Arguments Related {A B}%type_scope _ _ _%rel_scope
rel_pull_refl : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (R : rel ?B ?B), Reflexive R -> Reflexive (R @@ (f)) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
rel_pull_relim : forall (f : ?A -> ?A') (g : ?B -> ?B') (R : rel ?A' ?B') (x : ?A) (y : ?B) (P Q : Prop), RElim R (f x) (g y) P Q -> RElim (R @@ (f, g)) x y P Q where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type] ?A' : [ |- Type] ?B' : [ |- Type]
rel_pull_sym : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (R : relation ?B), Symmetric R -> Symmetric (R @@ (f)) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
rel_pull_rintro : forall (f : ?A -> ?A') (g : ?B -> ?B') (R : ?A' -> ?B' -> Prop) (x : ?A) (y : ?B), RStep (R (f x) (g y)) ((R @@ (f, g)) x y) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type] ?A' : [ |- Type] ?B' : [ |- Type]
CandidateProperty = fun (A B : Type) (R' : rel A B) (f : A) (g : B) (_ : Prop) => R' f g : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop -> Prop Arguments CandidateProperty {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope _ _ _%type_scope
Unnamed_thm24 : forall (W : Type) (acc : rel W W) (A B C : Type) (R1 : W -> rel A A) (R2 : W -> rel B B) (R3 : W -> rel C C) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> option C) (a b : A) (x : C) (w : W), Monotonic f (rforall w0 : W, R1 w0 ++> R2 w0) -> Monotonic g (rforall w0 : W, R2 w0 ++> option_rel (rel_incr acc R3 w0)) -> R1 w a b -> g (f a) = Some x -> exists y : C, rel_incr acc R3 w x y
rel_push_rintro : forall (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2) (R : rel ?A1 ?A2) (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RIntro (R x y) R !! (f, g) (f x) (g y) where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
arrow_pointwise_rintro : forall (R : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A -> ?B1) (g : ?A -> ?B2), RIntro (forall x : ?A, R (f x) (g x)) (- ==> R) f g where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
Unnamed_thm16 : forall (A B C : Type) (R : rel A A) (f : A -> rel B C) (a1 a2 : A) (b : B) (c : C), Monotonic f (R ++> subrel) -> R a1 a2 -> impl (f a1 b c) (f a2 b c)
option_rel_some_inv : forall (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (x : option A) (y : option B) (a : A), option_rel R x y -> x = Some a -> exists b : B, (y = Some b /\ R a b)%type
Inductive rel_push (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) (R : rel A1 A2) : rel B1 B2 := rel_push_rintro : forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RIntro (R x y) R !! (f, g) (f x) (g y) Arguments rel_push {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope Arguments rel_push_rintro {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope
arrow_rintro : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2), RIntro (forall (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ++> RB) f g where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
rel_all = fun (A B C : Type) (R : C -> rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => forall c : C, R c x y : forall A B C : Type, (C -> rel A B) -> rel A B Arguments rel_all {A B C}%type_scope _%function_scope
rel_pull_rcompose : forall (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2) (h : ?A3 -> ?B3) (R12 : rel ?B1 ?B2) (R23 : rel ?B2 ?B3) (R13 : rel ?B1 ?B3), RCompose R12 R23 R13 -> RCompose (R12 @@ (f, g)) (R23 @@ (g, h)) (R13 @@ (f, h)) where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?A3 : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type] ?B3 : [ |- Type]
arrow_rel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) => forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y) : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type, rel A1 A2 -> rel B1 B2 -> rel (A1 -> B1) (A2 -> B2) Arguments arrow_rel {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (RA RB)%rel_scope : rename
rel_ex = fun (A B C : Type) (R : C -> rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => exists c : C, R c x y : forall A B C : Type, (C -> rel A B) -> rel A B Arguments rel_ex {A B C}%type_scope _%function_scope
Build_RemoveAllParams : forall (A B C D : Type) (m1 : A) (m2 : B) (f : C) (g : D), RemoveAllParams m1 m2 f g
forall_relim : forall (R : forall (x : ?V1) (x0 : ?V2), ?E x x0 -> rel (?FV1 x) (?FV2 x0)) (f : forall x : ?V1, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V2, ?FV2 x) (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2) (e : ?E v1 v2) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R v1 v2 e) (f v1) (g v2) P Q -> RElim (forallr e @ v1 v2, R v1 v2 e) f g P Q where ?V1 : [ |- Type] ?V2 : [ |- Type] ?E : [ |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?FV1 : [ |- ?V1 -> Type] ?FV2 : [ |- ?V2 -> Type]
Unnamed_thm2 : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (R : rel A A) (f : A -> A) (p : A -> Prop), Monotonic f (R ++> R) -> Monotonic p (R --> impl) -> R a b -> p (f b) -> p (f a)
Build_RemoveParams : forall (A B C D : Type) (n : nat) (m1 : A) (m2 : B) (f : C) (g : D), RemoveParams n m1 m2 f g
Unnamed_thm11 : forall (R : rel ?A ?A) (f : ?A -> ?A) (C : ?A -> Prop) (x y : ?A), Monotonic f (R ++> eq) -> R x y -> C (f x) -> C (f y) where ?A : [ |- Type]
RIntro = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) => P -> R m n : forall A B : Type, Prop -> rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop Arguments RIntro {A B}%type_scope _%type_scope _%rel_scope
RExists = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) => P -> R m n : forall A B : Type, Prop -> rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop Arguments RExists {A B}%type_scope _%type_scope _%rel_scope
arrow_pointwise_relim : forall (R : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A -> ?B1) (g : ?A -> ?B2) (m n : ?A) (P Q : Prop), RElim R (f m) (g n) P Q -> RElim (- ==> R) f g (m = n /\ P) Q where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
rdestruct_result = fun (A B : Type) (m : A) (n : B) (Q : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => m = x /\ n = y -> Q x y : forall A B : Type, A -> B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rdestruct_result {A B}%type_scope _ _ _%rel_scope
respectful_rintro : forall (RA : relation ?A) (RB : relation ?B) (f g : ?A -> ?B), RIntro (forall x y : ?A, RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ==> RB)%signature f g where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
rel_impl = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_impl {A B}%type_scope (_ _)%rel_scope
RElim = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (P Q : Prop) => R m n -> P -> Q : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop -> Prop -> Prop Arguments RElim {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope _ _ (_ _)%type_scope
Transport = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (a : A) (b : B) (PA PB : Prop) => R a b -> PA -> PB : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop -> Prop -> Prop Arguments Transport {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope _ _ (_ _)%type_scope
forall_pointwise_rintro : forall (FE : forall v : ?V, rel (?FV1 v) (?FV2 v)) (f : forall x : ?V, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V, ?FV2 x), RIntro (forall v : ?V, FE v (f v) (g v)) (forallr - @ v, FE v) f g where ?V : [ |- Type] ?FV1 : [ |- ?V -> Type] ?FV2 : [ |- ?V -> Type]
RDestruct = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (T : rel A B -> Prop) => forall (m : A) (n : B), R m n -> forall P : rel A B, T P -> P m n : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> (rel A B -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments RDestruct {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope _%function_scope
RCompose = fun (A B C : Type) (RAB : rel A B) (RBC : rel B C) (RAC : rel A C) => forall (x : A) (y : B) (z : C), RAB x y -> RBC y z -> RAC x z : forall A B C : Type, rel A B -> rel B C -> rel A C -> Prop Arguments RCompose {A B C}%type_scope (_ _ _)%rel_scope
remove_all_params_candidate : forall (R : ?A -> ?B -> Prop) (m1 : ?A) (m2 : ?B) (R' : rel ?C ?D) (f : ?C) (g : ?D), RemoveAllParams m1 m2 f g -> Related f g R' -> CandidateProperty R' f g (R m1 m2) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type] ?C : [ |- Type] ?D : [ |- Type]
rintro = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (RIntro : RIntro P R m n) => RIntro : forall (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B), RIntro P R m n -> P -> R m n Arguments rintro {A B P}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope {m n RIntro}
relim = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (P Q : Prop) (RElim : RElim R m n P Q) => RElim : forall (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (P Q : Prop), RElim R m n P Q -> R m n -> P -> Q Arguments relim {A B}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope {m n} {P Q}%type_scope {RElim}
rel_union = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => (R1 x y \/ R2 x y)%type : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_union {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
rel_inter = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => (R1 x y /\ R2 x y)%type : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_inter {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope

```  
intros A B f R g x y H.
apply H.
